title: Affordable Housing Community-Apps Being Accepted - 1/2BR
posting_body: ['Applications Being Accepted!', 'Affordable housing--Rent based upon 30% of your adjusted household income.', 'If you are soon to be or are already in a housing transition - learn more about our affordable (multifamily) housing community options.', 'Andrews Place - 1BR suites (62+ or better) and Lakeway Place - 2BR suites (18+ or better).', 'Yes, there are wait lists!', 'Vacancy openings are filled from our waiting list.', 'Get your application in!!', 'Better to get your name on the wait list to be able to transition into an affordable housing community.', 'Not currently doing in-person face-to-face application appointments.', 'Please contact me for details on applications.', 'Check us out!!!', 'Website: <URL>/   or', '<URL>/', 'Call for details to', 'show contact info', '.', 'We would love to have you as a future resident in our community!!!']
